elements.title: Summer 2021 announcements
elements.contents:
Summer 2021 announcements
Posted on July 20, 2021 by LightArrowsEXE

Unfortunately, we're not planning on picking up any shows this season. Instead we'll be giving a status update on current projects, how they're going, and what our rough plans currently are. Please note that these are not final, and we may pick up dropped series or change our plans at any time based on staff discretion.

Seasonals:

  • Uzaki-chan: Dropped
  • Kumo desu ga: On-hold, likely switching to BDs at a future date
  • Yuru Camp 2: Slowly progressing, likely to switch over to BDs post-ep4

Other:

  • Majo no Tabitabi: BDs slowly in progress once other projects are finished @GJM. No batch planned for the time being.
  • FGO Babylonia: On-hold. Potentially seeing some staff changes in the future.
  • Grand Carnival: Waiting for episode 2 (Sept)
  • Prisma Phantasm: Progressing, high priority
  • Granblue Fantasy 2: All BDMVs finally available, slowly working on it inbetween other projects
  • Higurashi: Progressing, working on it as episodes (slowly) get encoded
  • Joshiraku: Progressing
  • Tate no Yuusha: Potentially dropped, not entirely sure yet

And that's it for the time being! We'll try to keep you updated per-season, but you can always ask about projects in our Discord server (granted you aren't annoying about it, of course).

elements.title: Fate/stay night [Heaven's Feel]
elements.contents:
Fate/stay night [Heaven's Feel]
Posted on May 29, 2021 by LightArrowsEXE

Done in collaboration with SCY.

This project has been many months in the making, and I'm glad we've finally finalised it. These movies were a hell of a lot of work to do, but I'm glad to say that it's finally out! We hope you guys enjoy it as much as we enjoyed working on it, and keep an eye out for some fun little easter eggs we hid here and there.

Please note that we use this styleguide for editing/translation decisions. This means partial honorifics preservation, general localisation, and ideally consistent terminology use across all our Fate releases. For reference, we follow this for Babylonia as well.

Special thanks to the staff that put up with all my shit, everyone who helped with the "public" QC watches, and all the people who helped me out with editing suggestions and additional typesetting. Below is a list of all the contributors:

  • Nazaki — ED (1, 2), QC (1)
  • rcombs — QC (1, 2)
  • daregakimeta — QC (3)
  • Angrevol — TS (3)
  • arcologue — ED, QC (1, 2)
  • Aria — TLC/ED (1, 2, 3)
  • joletb — TS (that went unused, sorry!) (3)
  • LuceoEtzio — ED (3)

(My memory is shit so if I forgot to add you, poke me)

Links: Torrent | Magnet
Check out our Discord server!
If you have playback issues, use mpv.

elements.title: Kimetsu no Yaiba (BD) - Batch
elements.contents:
Kimetsu no Yaiba (BD) - Batch
Posted on April 30, 2021 by LightArrowsEXE

And it's finally, finally over! Special thanks to The0x for going through the extra lengths to ensure the batch was as good as it could possibly be. Most of the good changes from our individual episodes/volumes are his handiwork.

We have no plans for the movie or any other sequels currently, but we welcome any good translators/editors who may have questions if they want to make their release consistent with ours.

Also, as is customary, the github repository with all our work is open now that we've finalised release. Make sure to check it out if you plan on building a release yourself.

Links: Torrent | Magnet
Check out our Discord server!
If you have playback issues, use mpv.
